details.excerpt: The DaPaaS project is funded as part of the [seventh framework programme for research and technological development (FP7)](http://cordis.europa.eu/fp7/homeen.html)
details.content:
The DaPaaS project is funded as part of the seventh framework programme for research and technological development (FP7)

FP7 provides the main instrument for funding research in Europe; with a total programme budget of over â‚¬50 billion. The activities funded through FP7 seek to complement national research programmes, bringing together consortia including participants from different European (and other) countries, addressing complex research challenges across national borders.

Although not by any-means exhaustive, this page includes other relevant links. Please feel free to email us with any suggestions for sites you think deserve to be added to this list: amanda.smith@theodi.org

  • World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)
  • Digital Agenda for Europe

Follow DaPaaS on Twitter
